data.Lingua:: base namespace; in addition, the module which inspired this
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The natural language packages all appear to be grouped into the
    Lingua:: base namespace; in addition, the module which inspired this
    one (Perligata) is here, and actually is similar in intent to BURL:
    a filter which allows one to program perl in a different language
    idiom (although in this case, the language isn't "natural").
